reviews.title: Typical Wired.
reviews.comment: All this app does is open my browser to the wired store which has no app reviews. I\'m sure the iOS version works fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is really awful. It takes you to a non-mobile-friendly version of the Wired Store. Somebody gets fired at Wired?!?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t bother on Android
reviews.comment: Like others said. Opens Wired store in browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No app guide
reviews.comment: This isn\'t an app guide.  All it does is open the browser and go to the wired store.  Where is the app guide from your magazine?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: No apps, even at the website?  Bizarre.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrated
reviews.comment: Please bring the mag app to Android...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nothing
reviews.comment: Not even copy-paste to offer it offline.
reviews.author: A Google User
